message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm willing to part with it for $20,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but my budget is closer to $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. $10,000 is quite low, but I understand your budget constraints. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my reach.  I'm firm on my budget of $10,000.  If you're not willing to go lower, I'll have to move on to another seller.
